review_text: You know, I was (except during his bad behaviour from 2013, and half of 2014) always that rare thing... a male Bieliber, and possibly am a little biased, but this is a pretty good movie. Definitely the Bielibers will enjoy it (I have to admit, being 17 years old at the time, I was grateful to be almost alone in the screen, as I got to miss screaming fangirls), but I think people who go with an open mind should enjoy it too :)
